EmailTemplate.name: Can I Send You a Pair of Rangers Tickets? (1494449267.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Can I Send You a Pair of Rangers Tickets? (1494449267.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi Eric, With baseball season underway and summer right around the corner, I want to make sure you have a chance to spend some time cheering on the Rangers in Arlington. Turbonomic is giving away a pair of Rangers tickets to the game of your choice for simply scheduling a 30-minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer during the month of May. Schedule your meeting here <[[https://turbonomic.com/turbonomic-rangers-game-summer-giveaway/]]>, and we will get you over to Globe Life Park! Best, CatherineÂ Catherine Kellogg Sr. Marketing Program Manager O: 781.418.5280 | M: 617.306.1485 Catherine.kellogg@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:Catherine.kellogg@turbonomic.com]]>
